title: thunderbird/lightning + owncloud ical | multiple ical login (same user-login)
body:
i'm using a fresh owncloud instance (updated from previous releases) in combination with thunderbird / lightning.

i'm using some calendar-feeds hosted on owncloud. every time i startup my thunderbird/lightning client that requests for ical updates to owncloud, my thunderbird requests for every single calendar for login.

1. every login is the same!
2. every calendar is hosted on the same owncloud instance!
3. i've already tried to enter the credentials in url-format into the owncloud uri for ical. no luck!
4. i've already tried to "save password" within thunderbird.
already no luck!

i think it must have to do something with the uri-path used for owncloud cal. may be there is some restriction (.htaccess or owncloud code) that prevents authentication across those differing uri?

please also note my separate bug-track suggesting to use a user-based hash authentication in every ical automatically generated by owncloud cal. this would prevent entering credentials in uri-format into external clients (security risk). this feature should be optionally for users who prefer the native authentication.
